thought: To craft polished_blackstone_slab, I need to craft polished_blackstone first. Polished_blackstone requires placing 4 blackstones in a square in the crafting table, therefore I will first need to move the blackstone from slot 23 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 23 to slot 1 with quantity 1
